t: A Call to Praise the Lord for His Righteousness.
O*pn sing to the Lord*s a new song, For*ln He has done wonderful things, His*ln right hand and His holy arm have gained the victory for Him.
The*ln Lord*s has made known His salvation; He*ln has revealed His righteousness in the sight of the nations.
He*ln has remembered His lovingkindness and His faithfulness to the house of Israel; All*ln the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Shout*ln joyfully to the Lord,*s all the earth; Break*ln forth and sing for joy and sing praises.
Sing*ln praises to the Lord*s with the lyre, With*ln the lyre and the sound of melody.
With*ln trumpets and the sound of the horn Shout*ln joyfully before the King, the Lord.*s
Let*ln the sea roar and all it contains, The*ln world and those who dwell in it.
Let*ln the rivers clap their hands, Let*ln the mountains sing together for joy
Before*ln the Lord,*s for He is coming to judge the earth; He*ln will judge the world with righteousness And*ln the peoples with equity.
